title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 19, 2022

items.title: Awesome Broadcasting
items.content_text:
### Video Production

*   [AutoMix (⭐6)](https://github.com/InsanityRadio/automix/) - Web-based control surface for ATEM vision mixers with automated camera switching, designed for visualised radio.
items.content_html:
Video Production

items.title: Awesome Playwright
items.content_text:
### Utils

*   [Playwright Test for VSCode](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-playwright.playwright) - Official Playwright test extension for VS Code.
*   [Maestro for IntelliJ](https://plugins.jetbrains.com/plugin/18100-maestro) - Playwright plugin for IntelliJ.

Utils

items.title: Open Source Flutter Apps
items.content_text:
### Contents / Health and Fitness

*   [WorkoutTracker (⭐98)](https://github.com/jerichoi224/WorkoutTracker) - A Flutter app to help you keep track of workout sessions by [Daniel Choi](https://github.com/jerichoi224).

### Contents / Media

*   [MovieLab (⭐441)](https://github.com/ErfanRht/MovieLab) - A useful and modern movie database app by [Erfan Rahmati](https://github.com/ErfanRht).
items.content_html:
Contents / Health and Fitness

  • WorkoutTracker (⭐98) - A Flutter app to help you keep track of workout sessions by Daniel Choi.

Contents / Media

  • MovieLab (⭐441) - A useful and modern movie database app by Erfan Rahmati.

items.title: Awesome Esp
items.content_text:
### Firmware

*   [Sming Framework (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/SmingHub/Sming) - Superb C/C++ IoT Framework with support for ESP8266 and ESP32.

### Tools

*   [NodeMCU Flasher (⭐2.1k)](https://github.com/nodemcu/nodemcu-flasher) - The official flashing tool for the NodeMCU OS.

### Projects / Smart Home and IoT

*   [ESPEasy (⭐3.4k)](https://github.com/letscontrolit/ESPEasy) - Easily turn ESP modules into multifunction sensor devices for home automation systems.
*   [DoorsignEPD (⭐100)](https://github.com/jamct/DoorsignEPD) - A smart doorsign with an E-Paper display using the ESP32.
*   [HomePoint (⭐648)](https://github.com/sieren/Homepoint) - Control MQTT/HomeKit smart home devices from an ESP32-powered screen.
*   [openHASP](https://www.openhasp.com/) - Control your home automation devices from a customizable touchscreen UI connected via MQTT.

### Projects / LoRa

*   [ESP32-Paxcounter (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/cyberman54/ESP32-Paxcounter#esp32-paxcounter) - Wifi & Bluetooth driven, LoRaWAN enabled, battery powered mini Paxcounter built on cheap ESP32 LoRa IoT boards.
*   [Disaster Radio](https://disaster.radio/) - A disaster-resilient communications network powered by the sun.

### Projects / Music and Audio

*   [Alles (⭐280)](https://github.com/bwhitman/alles) - A many speaker distributed music synthesizer using UDP multicast over WiFi, modeled after the alles machine/AMY.
*   [ESP32-Radio (⭐1k)](https://github.com/Edzelf/ESP32-Radio) - Internet radio based on ESP32, VS1053 and a TFT screen.
*   [ESPuino (⭐323)](https://github.com/biologist79/ESPuino) - RFID-controlled music player powered by ESP32.
*   [Knobby (⭐193)](https://github.com/quadule/knobby) - A handheld Spotify remote that encourages you to explore unfamiliar music.
*   [PedalinoMini (⭐569)](https://github.com/alf45tar/PedalinoMini) - A wireless MIDI pedal controller for guitarists, built with the ESP32.
*   [Squeezelite-esp32 (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/sle118/squeezelite-esp32) - Streaming audio receiver with multi-room sync, AirPlay, Bluetooth, hardware buttons, display and more.
*   [ThingPulse esp8266-spotify-remote (⭐271)](https://github.com/ThingPulse/esp8266-spotify-remote) - Control your Spotify player from a ESP8266 with color touch display.

### Projects / Smartwatches

*   [mutantW\_V1](https://mutantcybernetics.com/mutantW_V1.html) - An ESP32 based open source smartwatch with 1.7 inch display, WiFi, Bluetooth, NeoPixel and vibration.
*   [StickWatch (⭐90)](https://github.com/eggfly/StickWatch) - A smartwatch module based on the M5Stick, using the ESP32.
*   [Watchy](https://watchy.sqfmi.com) - An open source e-paper watch with lots of options for customization.

### Projects / Others

*   [E-TKT (⭐430)](https://github.com/andreisperid/E-TKT) - An ESP32 powered DIY label maker that mixes both old fashioned and contemporary technology.
*   [FreeTouchDeck (⭐665)](https://github.com/DustinWatts/FreeTouchDeck) - Open source touch macropad and stream control deck with built-in web configurator.
*   [SmartSpin2k (⭐227)](https://github.com/doudar/SmartSpin2k) - Transform your spin bike into a smart trainer with automatic resistance knob control in fitness apps like Zwift.
*   [WirelessPrinting (⭐365)](https://github.com/probonopd/WirelessPrinting) - Print wirelessly from Cura, PrusaSlicer or Slic3r to your 3D printer connected to an ESP module.
*   [WLED](https://kno.wled.ge/) - Control many types of RGB(W) LED strips with an ESP8266 or ESP32 over WiFi.

### Libraries / Others

*   [LVGL](https://lvgl.io) - An open-source graphics library providing everything you need to create embedded GUIs with easy-to-use graphical elements, beautiful visual effects and low memory footprint.
*   [ESP32-audioI2S (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/schreibfaul1/ESP32-audioI2S) - Plays mp3, m4a and wav files from SD card or stream via I2S interface.
*   [HomeSpan (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/HomeSpan/HomeSpan) - A robust and extremely easy-to-use Arduino library for creating your own ESP32-based HomeKit devices.
items.content_html:
Firmware

  • Sming Framework (⭐1.5k) - Superb C/C++ IoT Framework with support for ESP8266 and ESP32.

Tools

  • NodeMCU Flasher (⭐2.1k) - The official flashing tool for the NodeMCU OS.

Projects / Smart Home and IoT

  • ESPEasy (⭐3.4k) - Easily turn ESP modules into multifunction sensor devices for home automation systems.
  • DoorsignEPD (⭐100) - A smart doorsign with an E-Paper display using the ESP32.
  • HomePoint (⭐648) - Control MQTT/HomeKit smart home devices from an ESP32-powered screen.
  • openHASP - Control your home automation devices from a customizable touchscreen UI connected via MQTT.

Projects / LoRa

  • ESP32-Paxcounter (⭐1.9k) - Wifi & Bluetooth driven, LoRaWAN enabled, battery powered mini Paxcounter built on cheap ESP32 LoRa IoT boards.
  • Disaster Radio - A disaster-resilient communications network powered by the sun.

Projects / Music and Audio

  • Alles (⭐280) - A many speaker distributed music synthesizer using UDP multicast over WiFi, modeled after the alles machine/AMY.
  • ESP32-Radio (⭐1k) - Internet radio based on ESP32, VS1053 and a TFT screen.
  • ESPuino (⭐323) - RFID-controlled music player powered by ESP32.
  • Knobby (⭐193) - A handheld Spotify remote that encourages you to explore unfamiliar music.
  • PedalinoMini (⭐569) - A wireless MIDI pedal controller for guitarists, built with the ESP32.
  • Squeezelite-esp32 (⭐1.6k) - Streaming audio receiver with multi-room sync, AirPlay, Bluetooth, hardware buttons, display and more.
  • ThingPulse esp8266-spotify-remote (⭐271) - Control your Spotify player from a ESP8266 with color touch display.

Projects / Smartwatches

  • mutantW_V1 - An ESP32 based open source smartwatch with 1.7 inch display, WiFi, Bluetooth, NeoPixel and vibration.
  • StickWatch (⭐90) - A smartwatch module based on the M5Stick, using the ESP32.
  • Watchy - An open source e-paper watch with lots of options for customization.

Projects / Others

  • E-TKT (⭐430) - An ESP32 powered DIY label maker that mixes both old fashioned and contemporary technology.
  • FreeTouchDeck (⭐665) - Open source touch macropad and stream control deck with built-in web configurator.
  • SmartSpin2k (⭐227) - Transform your spin bike into a smart trainer with automatic resistance knob control in fitness apps like Zwift.
  • WirelessPrinting (⭐365) - Print wirelessly from Cura, PrusaSlicer or Slic3r to your 3D printer connected to an ESP module.
  • WLED - Control many types of RGB(W) LED strips with an ESP8266 or ESP32 over WiFi.

Libraries / Others

  • LVGL - An open-source graphics library providing everything you need to create embedded GUIs with easy-to-use graphical elements, beautiful visual effects and low memory footprint.
  • ESP32-audioI2S (⭐1.4k) - Plays mp3, m4a and wav files from SD card or stream via I2S interface.
  • HomeSpan (⭐1.9k) - A robust and extremely easy-to-use Arduino library for creating your own ESP32-based HomeKit devices.
